feature.name: MakePRD Help Documentation Validation
feature.description: Validate all documentation sections in the sidebar are present

scenarios.scenario_name: Verify all sidebar navigation items exist

given.step: User navigates to help docs and waits for sidebar

then.step: Quick Start Guide link should be present

element.locator: a:has-text('Quick Start Guide'), button:has-text('Quick Start Guide'), div:has-text('Quick Start Guide')

then.step: AI Modes link should be present

element.locator: a:has-text('AI Modes'), button:has-text('AI Modes'), div:has-text('AI Modes')

then.step: PROMPT Blocks link should be present

element.locator: a:has-text('PROMPT Blocks'), button:has-text('PROMPT Blocks'), div:has-text('PROMPT Blocks')

then.step: Table Outputs link should be present

element.locator: a:has-text('Table Outputs'), button:has-text('Table Outputs'), div:has-text('Table Outputs')

then.step: Credit System link should be present

element.locator: a:has-text('Credit System'), button:has-text('Credit System'), div:has-text('Credit System')

then.step: Subscription Plans link should be present

element.locator: a:has-text('Subscription Plans'), button:has-text('Subscription Plans'), div:has-text('Subscription Plans')

then.step: Managing Chats link should be present

element.locator: a:has-text('Managing Chats'), button:has-text('Managing Chats'), div:has-text('Managing Chats')

then.step: User Interface link should be present

element.locator: a:has-text('User Interface'), button:has-text('User Interface'), div:has-text('User Interface')

then.step: Account Settings link should be present

element.locator: a:has-text('Account Settings'), button:has-text('Account Settings'), div:has-text('Account Settings')

then.step: Best Practices link should be present

element.locator: a:has-text('Best Practices'), button:has-text('Best Practices'), div:has-text('Best Practices')

then.step: Keyboard Shortcuts link should be present

element.locator: a:has-text('Keyboard Shortcuts'), button:has-text('Keyboard Shortcuts'), div:has-text('Keyboard Shortcuts')

then.step: Support & Contact link should be present

element.locator: a:has-text('Support & Contact'), button:has-text('Support & Contact'), div:has-text('Support & Contact')
